page.title: 06Red Post Garage
page.content: We went to Red Post Garage. They are the only garage around that have a Sun engine tuner. It is a family business and he wants to keep it. He can make a living but not a good one but he enjoys the job. Selling cars is not the main business. His main business is M.O.T. and servicing so he has all the special equipment. He does up cars. His hobby is camping and running a canoeing club. He keeps some sheep and he is a special constable in his spare time and at weekends. We enjoyed this visit very much.
